instructions: Sit in a comfortable position with your eyes closed and focus on your breath. When your mind wanders, gently bring your attention back to your breath.
script:
Welcome to your Mindfulness Meditation practice. [pause]

Find a comfortable position, either sitting or lying down. [pause]

Close your eyes gently and take three deep breaths. [pause]

Sit in a comfortable position with your eyes closed and focus on your breath. When your mind wanders, gently bring your attention back to your breath. [pause]

Allow yourself to settle into this practice naturally. [pause]

If your mind wanders, that's perfectly normal. Simply notice the thought and gently return your attention to the practice. [pause]

Continue with this awareness for the next few minutes. [pause]

[2 minute pause for practice]

Now, slowly bring your attention back to your surroundings. [pause]

Take a deep breath and when you're ready, gently open your eyes. [pause]

Your Mindfulness Meditation practice is complete. Take a moment to notice how you feel.
